title: Exception Handling
description: Handle exceptions and create custom error messages in JavaScript

problems.title: Try-Catch Block
problems.description: Handle a division by zero error and print 'Cannot divide by zero'.

problems.title: Custom Exception
problems.description: Create a custom exception `NegativeNumberError` and raise it when a negative number is passed.

problems.title: File Not Found Exception
problems.description: Handle a `FileNotFoundError` when trying to read a non-existent file in Node.js.
